text: Nam'ma vacanagalannu dhikkarisuvavarannu khanditavagiyu navu bahubegane narakagniyolage eseyaliddeve. (Alli) avaru sikseyannu saviyuttale iralendu, avara carmavu bendu karagi hodaga, navu adara badalige avarige hosa carmavannu todisuvevu. Khanditavagiyu allahanu pracandanu yuktivantanu agiddane
